sentences.sContent: The sensor system using this stabilization method is susceptive to the disturbance and has a high cost.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sensor system using this stabilization method is susceptive to the disturbance and has a high cost.
sentences.sCn: 该传感器系统的稳定使用此方法是敏感到的干扰和具有较高的成本。

synos.tran: 敏感的；感受性强的；易接受的

trans.tranCn: 感受性强的, 敏感的, 有接受力的
